graceful.translation[0].definitions[0].d: moving in a smooth and attractive way, or having an attractive shape or form
graceful.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Her movements were graceful and elegant.
The branches formed a graceful curve.
graceful.translation[0].definitions[1].d: behaving in a polite and pleasant way
graceful.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Her father was a quiet man with graceful manners.
